pullrequest.title: Logging Part 3: Getting all messages from a log file

content.raw: Could we move this code to the constructor and replace `data` and `dataLen` members with a `std::string data`. This way, we reduce the number of member variables and also calling this method should be a simple `return this->dataPtr->data`. Consider the same suggestion for `Type()` and `Topic()`.
content.html: Could we move this code to the constructor and replace data and dataLen members with a std::string data. This way, we reduce the number of member variables and also calling this method should be a simple return this->dataPtr->data. Consider the same suggestion for Type() and Topic().
